message: Just finished Season 2, that got very very good at the end, now onto season 3.
What's the best season in your opinions?
I think this is the only show that I've ever watched where I didn't have a favorite season. I enjoyed them all equally.
its really really hard to watch later episodes in season 4 without needing a strong drink afterwards though
season 4 is in my favorite, but saying its the best isn't really true
though the kids in Season 4 are just incredible
Season 3 might have to be my favorite. There's Hampsterdam, Brother Mouzone and lots of Omar.
Whoa, whoa whoa, worlds collide, nice to see you here @jaaamin!
I had to check out your new project @ericflo. It's lookin good.
